insert into bi_news_center(id,title,type,content,view_times,create_user,create_time,content_text,manu_id) select [news_id],[title],[type],content,0,create_user,create_time,content_text,id from bi_manu where id=[manu_id2]; insert into sys_file(id,busi_id,busi_type,name,path,thumb_path,type,status,creator_id,create_time) select sys_guid(),[news_id],'BI_NEWS_CENTER',name,path,thumb_path,type,status,creator_id,sysdate from sys_file where busi_id=[manu_id2] and busi_type='BI_MANU';
insert into sys_file(id,busi_id,busi_type,name,path,thumb_path,type,status,creator_id,create_time) select sys_guid(),[news_id],'BI_NEWS_CENTER_ATTACH',name,path,thumb_path,type,status,creator_id,sysdate from sys_file where busi_id=[manu_id2] and busi_type='BI_MANU_ATTACH'
